text:
e="preserve">Raheela Naeem () is a Pakistani politician who has been a Member of the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab, since May 2013.
Early life and education.
She was born on 2 July 1976 in Lahore.
Political career.
She was elected to the [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Provincial_Assembly_of_the_Punjab Provincial Assembly of the Punjab] as a candidate of [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistan_Muslim_League_(N) Pakistan Muslim League (N)] (PML-N) on a reserved seat for women in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2008 Pakistani general election, 2008].<ref name="pap/2008">
She was re-elected to the Provincial Assembly of the Punjab as a candidate of PML-N on a reserved seat for women in [//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakistani_general_election,_2013 Pakistani general election, 2013].
